VModer.GameRootPath: The root path of HOI4 game folder.
VModer.RamQueryIntervalTime: The interval time of querying RAM, Unit is millisecond.
VModer.Blacklist: The list of file names that will not be analyzed.
VModer.ParseFileMaxSize: The maximum size of file that will be parsed, Unit is MB.
VModer.GameLocalizedLanguage: The language of the game text.
